beta.label: Beta
beta.html: This is a new service - your feedback will help us to improve it.

service.name: Check a regulated profession in the UK

index.intro: Some professions in the UK are regulated. If you want to work in a regulated profession, you need to contact the regulatory authority who will recognise your qualification and register you.
servicePurposes: Check if your profession is regulated and what qualifications are required
Find regulatory authority contact details for your profession
View annual figures regarding applications to work in regulated professions in the UK

otherWays.heading: Other ways to find information
otherWays.body: If you need support checking a regulated profession you can contact The UK Centre for Professional Qualifications (UK CPQ).

selectService.heading: Select what you want to do

options.checkRequirements: Check requirements for a regulated profession
